Articles.Content:
Oh hark, the Kraken Glitches signing

All will hail, the Kraken-king

Kerbals of Kerbin, you will be killed

If you don't, bend to his will

If your rockets should arise..

He will wobble them out of the skies.

And with,this song, the glitches proclaim

The Space Kraken-king, shall rise again!

Hark the Kraken Glitches singing

All will hail, the Kraken King

The Kraken by highest hatred hated

The Kraken, our everlasting lord

Attacking from Bop, behold him come

Offspring of a Physics Glitch

Veiled in shadows the Kraken sees

A brand new target moving in the Dunaian breeze

Sending it to hell, another kill done

The big space squid, shall have some fun

Hark, the kraken Glitches singing,

All will hail, the Kraken-king

Hail the kraken of the dark

Hail the kraken of the void

Explosions and disassembly to all he brings

Rising with death under his tentacles

Woe to the one, that finds him awake

Launch that rocket that he shall wreck

No matter how much you cry, he doesn't give a heck

He is here, to stay for all

And the space kraken king, shall rise again.
Now all we need is someone singing this to a video of glitches and explosions.

Now all we need is someone singing this to a video of glitches and explosions.

Basically singing it with the background as any Danny2462 video ever.
